name: Tiru
introduction: The gods caused 'the catastrophe', and the gods saved me, so that I could spread my culture and my faith to you.
hateHello: I would have liked to see you survive 'the catastrophe'
declaringWar: You oppose the good sense of religion, I MUST exterminate you, so that the gods do not start again.
attacked: I have often had enemies who opposed me and the gods. And today, they are no more, and I stand before you. You should have thought before attacking.
defeated: you, have defeated, me? The gods are no longer on my side... No impossible ! I realized there is only one posibility. They have been for a long time dead. 'The catastrophe' was not their fault.

name: Lilelle
introduction: We've lost all our knowledge since... that. But we've kept our intelligence. We can help you if you'd like.
neutralHello: Hello, so you still believe in gods? That's adorable.
hateHello: We will use all our intelligence to harm you.
declaringWar: You are too stupid, we must eliminate you monkeys so as not to slow down our research.
attacked: I knew you were stupid, but not stupid enough to attack us.
defeated: What? You're just monkeys! INCOMPETENT, STUPID, MORONIC MONKEYS! How could you have defeated us?

name: Baa-Liao
introduction: Your nation is so large and populated, less than we were in our golden age. But for you it's impressive.
declaringWar: Sorry, but we must eradicate you, eradicate your nation. For the sake of those who survived.
attacked: Our nation may be less populous than in our golden age, less large. But we remain numerous enough to make you regret your undertaking.
defeated: 'The catastrophe' weakened us too much... We were no longer numerous enough to resist.

name: Kracts-Kur
introduction: Ha ha, your nation is very weak. So, like us since...
declaringWar: You are a threat to us, we may be weakened, but we are still powerful enough.
attacked: That only one nation managed to defeat us, the Baarb-Aeran, and you think you can defeat us?
defeated: Ha ha, I didn't realize we'd weakened so much. We would have totally dominated you at that age...

name: Buguri
introduction: Hello my friend! Unfortunately we don't have as many products as we did at our peak, but we can still trade.
neutralHello: Hello, do you want to trade with us?
hateHello: The art of exchange is lost. It has been replaced by your monstrosity.
declaringWar: We are not used to fighting wars with weapons. But sometimes the sword is more persuasive than gold..
attacked: You dare to attack the nation of gold. You will see the strength of gold.
defeated: we should have... we should have prepared our army more, and not strengthened our economy
